name: Modern_Splitback_Linen_Fabric_Convertible_Sleeper_Sofa_Futon
reviews: The style of the sofa is sleek and current but the comfort level is the worst. You can feel the wood slacks and the base frame when you sit. So if you prefer style over comfort then this is the sofa for you...

I wasn't really sure what to expect when I purchased this futon sofa. I wouldn't quite describe it as a futon (which I think of as a dense heavy cushion) rather a kind of very lightly padded springy feel. It's reasonably comfortable to sit on and could sleep an average sized person in a pinch! By which I mean, it's much better than the floor but definitely not somewhere to sleep night after night. It's strong point is that it looks great!
Looks lovely in my small living room!... Very class & modern. It lost 1 star, though, due to the comfort-level. Very firm and the 2 halves don't exactly line-up flush.
